DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy Harvoni® ( ledipasvir/sofosbuvir ( LDV/SOF ) fixed-dose combination ( FDC ) ) treatment real world use Japan . Among adult patient chronic genotype 1 hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) infection treat Harvoni routine clinical use , primary objective study evaluate incidence adverse drug reaction ( ADRs ) real world setting .
DOC.brief_title: Use-Results Surveillance Study Harvoni® Japanese Patients With Chronic Genotype 1 Hepatitis C Virus Infection
DOC.criteria: Key Adult patient chronic genotype 1 HCV infection without compensated cirrhosis Patients prescribed Harvoni Key Note : Other protocol define Inclusion/Exclusion criterion may apply .
